survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Online Grocery Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their experience with online grocery delivery services to improve service quality and customer satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which online grocery delivery platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online grocery delivery platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type where respondents can drag and drop options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: ranking (MULTI_CHOICE with ranking capability).

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness and quality of groceries delivered?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness and quality of groceries delivered?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
